## üè¶ Bank Information
**Bank Name**: [e.g., Wells Fargo, Chase, TD Bank]
**Country**: [e.g., USA, Canada]
**Statement Type**: [e.g., Checking Account, Credit Card, Savings]
**Statement Date Range**: [e.g., January 2025]

## ‚ö†Ô∏è What Happened?
- [ ] 0 transactions found (no transactions extracted)
- [ ] Some transactions missing (partial extraction)
- [ ] Wrong amounts or dates extracted
- [ ] Transactions from wrong time period
- [ ] Other: [describe]

## üìÑ Anonymized Sample Transactions
**IMPORTANT**: Please anonymize all sensitive information!

### ‚úÖ Safe to Share:
- Date format (Jan 15, 01/15/2025)
- Column structure
- Generic merchant names ("GROCERY STORE", "GAS STATION")

### ‚ùå DO NOT SHARE:
- Account numbers
- Real names
- Actual transaction amounts (you can change them)
- Balances
- Any personal information

### Sample (3-5 lines from your statement):
```
Paste 3-5 anonymized transaction lines here, for example:

Jan 15   GROCERY STORE         45.00
Jan 16   GAS STATION           60.00
Jan 17   COFFEE SHOP           5.50
```

## üîç Pattern Details (if known)
**Date Format**: [e.g., MMM DD, MM/DD/YYYY, DD-MM-YYYY]
**Columns Present**: [e.g., Date, Description, Amount, Balance]
**Decimal Format**: [e.g., 1,234.56 or 1.234,56]
**Currency**: [e.g., USD, CAD, EUR]

## üìä Transaction Count
**Total transactions in statement**: [e.g., 50]
**Transactions found by Teller**: [e.g., 0]

## üñºÔ∏è Screenshot (Optional)
If possible, share a screenshot of your PDF with **all sensitive info blacked out**.

## üí¨ Additional Notes
Any other information that might help us support your bank format.

---

**Privacy Reminder**: We only need the pattern/structure of your statement, not your actual financial data. When in doubt, change all numbers and names to dummy values!
